name: Duck Wars 1.1.0
description:
Controls:

P1 CTRLs:
W: Normal Attack
Q: Special Attack (Uses 3 MP)
E: Regen MP (Gives 1-2 MP, uses a turn.)
P2 CTRLs:
O: Normal Attack
I: Special Attack (Uses 3 MP)
P: Regen MP (Gives 1-2 MP uses a turn.)

Extras:

Play on Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/702744200/

Credits:
Sprites: Me
Code: Me
Music: Battle Theme is by me and the main menu theme was found on OpenGameArt.org, made by https://bondoer.fr or https://opengameart.org/users/pbondoer
Sound Effects: https://mixkit.co/ and me
